message:
Score: 1.0
Reasoning: The solution correctly considers all three cases (x=(A+B)/2 when integral, x=2A-B, x=2B-A), uses a set to handle duplicates, and thus counts all integer x that allow A,B,x to be arranged into an arithmetic sequence. It handles edge cases like A=B and odd/even sums, so it will pass all test cases.
